trans-unit.source: Provides a container for common metadata, for the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelMetadataProvider"></xref> class, and for the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelValidator"></xref> class for a data model.
trans-unit.target: 提供的通用的中繼資料的容器<xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelMetadataProvider"></xref>類別，以及<xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelValidator"></xref>資料模型的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelMetadata"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelMetadata"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the container, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no container.
trans-unit.target: 容器的類型或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有任何容器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the model is not a property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果模型不是屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns text to display for the model when the model represents a complex object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回模型中呈現複雜的物件時，模型的顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to display for a complex object.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的複雜物件的文字。

trans-unit.source: If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute> attribute for the model, the default is the name of the display column.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute>屬性的模型，預設值是顯示資料行的名稱。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the default is determined by calling the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.GetSimpleDisplayText*> method of the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata"></xref> base class.
trans-unit.target: 否則為預設值由呼叫<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.GetSimpleDisplayText*>方法<xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata"></xref>基底類別</xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.GetSimpleDisplayText*>
